receipt_tmpl_html.title: Receipt template, html
receipt_tmpl_html.description: Receipt template when player buys promotion. Possible variables: $CASINO_NAME$, $PLAYER_LEVEL$, $PLAYER_FIRST_NAME$, $PLAYER_LAST_NAME$, $PLAYER_NICK_NAME$, $PLAYER_REG_NUMBER$, $PROMO_NAME$, $BONUS_CREDIT$, $BONUS_POINTS$, $CREDIT$, $LOTTERY_POINTS$, $BONUS_PLAY$, $PROMO_CREDIT$, $SHOPPING_POINTS$, $STATUS_POINTS$, $ACTIVE_SINCE_DATE$, $ACTIVE_SINCE_TIME$, $EXPIRES_AT_DATE$, $EXPIRES_AT_TIME$, $VOUCHER_INIT_VOLUMES$

promo_descr.description: Promotions description to be shown to the customers. voucher_body.title: Voucher body text
